DOC.brief_summary: Several study report great weight loss follow high meat-protein diet limited study study high plant-based protein diet . Thus aim investigate effect high protein diet weight management also investigate superior protein source achieve effect . In addition , aim develop dietary intervention strategy realistic sustainable .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness High Protein Diets Promoting Weight Loss Overweight Obese Subjects .
DOC.detailed_description: Participants randomise either high-protein diet ( 30 % energy ) animal plant source standard protein diet ( 15 % energy ) weight loss diet 3 month .
DOC.criteria: Overweight obese Age 18 Both male female Live Illawarra Area Australia Regular medication Smoker Food allergy Presence disease may alter metabolic rate
